name: Metro Play Casino
paragraph1: 5 Reels 15 Paylines, Wild, Scatter, Free Spins Bonus, Gamble Feature.
paragraph2: Let Enchanted Meadow sprinkle you with magical Fairy dust in this atmospheric slot.
paragraph3: The game boasts an eye-catching and picturesque theme and players will be able to relax to the tranquil soundtrack and captivating sound effects.
